events.message: Customer submitted a claim reporting a vehicle collision that occurred on April 28th involving their car being rear-ended at a traffic light.
The submitted claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verifying keywords related to car collision and damages from the initial report.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage the case promptly ensuring the customer will receive dedicated support throughout the process.
Customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and to inform them about the next steps and required documentation.
Requested submission of police report, photos of damages, and medical reports related to the accident for proper evaluation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police accident report and detailed photos of the damaged rear bumper.
The claims investigation team began assessing the accident circumstances and verifying the authenticity of submitted documents.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident was duly caused by the other driver who failed to stop at a red light.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the repair costs of the vehicle and compensation for the inconvenience caused.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and clarity about the proposed settlement terms.
Following customer acceptance, the claim was approved for payment to proceed with the necessary vehicle repairs.
The payment covering the repair costs and additional fees was issued successfully to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The claim case was officially closed after confirmation of the vehicle repair completion and final customer satisfaction.
The closed claim records were archived into the system for future reference and auditing purposes.
